ValidationRule.description: An open text-based action plan must be provided in the Account Updates field if the Account Risk rating is High or Extreme
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK( Account_Updates__c), $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", $User.Override_Validation_Rules__c = False, ( ISPICKVAL(Account_Risk_Rating__c, 'HIGH')|| ISPICKVAL(Account_Risk_Rating__c, 'EXTREME') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: An open text-based action plan must be provided in the Account Updates field if the Account Risk rating is High or Extreme.
